title: external local storage: existing folders/files do not show up
body:
### expected behaviour
be able to "browse" the existing files in the folder defined as external storage

### actual behaviour
empty folder in files app. i can upload to the folder if i give http user write access, but i'm unable to see the existing folders in there no matter what permission i give them (world readable, even tested 777 and owned by http)

### steps to reproduce
1. add external local folder with existing files/folders
2. go to files app an click on the newly created folder
3. the folder is empty

owncloud log and webserver logs dont show any errors. mount.json is created correctly.

### server configuration
operating system: archlinux x86_64
web server: nginx 1.4.4 + php-fpm 5.5.7
database: postgresql 9.3.2
php version: 5.5.7

owncloud version: 6.0.0a

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: upgrade from 5.x

list of activated app:
- calendar
- contacts
- bookmarks
- share files
- pictures
- full text search
- documents
- external storage support
